nDTomo API reference
====================

The nDTomo software currently consists of three main packages:

* ID15A helper
* Integrator
* MultiTool


	
The "Integrator" module
-----------------------

.. automodule:: nDTomo.Integrator.ScatterTomoInt
	:members:

----------------------
